name: Catch Maruf
description:
Bepary Games

Catch Maruf

Game information/description

The game is about catching the creator Maruf or the ball. The game is Full HD so the game shouldn't lack any details. Show who you are and what you can do with you mouse.

There are a four stages:

  • The creator with one head which is easy, one head, not much to worry about.
  • The creator with two heads which is harder, but don't worry, thiking more helps you.
  • A ball which is for people that like football and don't want to stare at someone's face.
  • Two balls which is harder and makes you think more.
The more points you score the faster the head(s)/ball(s) will go get, and one more thing; if touch the 'wall' you will lose points but they will not lose speed.

Controls

  • Left click on the mouse.
  • To pause the game press P.
  • To exit the game press E.
  • To restart the game press R.
  • To go back to the main menu press M.

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 1GB RAM
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.

This game is not copyright free and should not be distributed without permision from Bepary Games. This game does NOT use resources from other publishers.
